definition: money is all-powerful/money can move God

surname Neng
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc

definition: with money, you can do anything (idiom)/money talks
lit. human beings will die for riches, just as birds will for food (idiom)/fig. man will do anything in his means to become rich

definition: officials shield one another (idiom); a cover-up
the notion in society that it's better to get ahead in the world by abandoning one's scruples than to suffer poverty/lit. despising poverty but not prostitution (idiom)
to buy a title/to use wealth to acquire office
stingy/penny-pinching
(literary) (euphemism) money (literally, "this thing")
to open one's eyes wide at the sight of profit (idiom); thinking of nothing but personal gain/money-grubbing
poor and with low expectations/poverty stunts ambition
all businessmen are evil (idiom)
the benevolent man cannot be rich (idiom, from Mencius). It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle than for a rich man to enter the kingdom of heaven (Matthew 19:24).
ill-gotten wealth or gains

rich and powerful (idiom)
the rich man cannot be benevolent (idiom, from Mencius). It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle than for a rich man to enter the kingdom of heaven (Matthew 19:24).
